description: This file is a C header file defining API declarations related to CCSP SnmpAgent PA for the 'cosa' module, including function prototypes for initialization, shutdown, parameter retrieval and setting, and table management.

methods.name: Cosa_FindDestComp
methods.description: Finds the destination component name and path for a given namespace.

methods.name: Cosa_GetParamValues
methods.description: Retrieves parameter values from a specified component and path.

methods.name: Cosa_SetCommit
methods.description: Commits or rolls back parameter changes.

methods.name: Cosa_GetInstanceNums
methods.description: Retrieves instance numbers for a specified object.

methods.name: Cosa_AddEntry
methods.description: Adds an entry to a table.

methods.name: Cosa_DelEntry
methods.description: Deletes an entry from a table.

methods.name: Cosa_FreeParamValues
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for parameter values.

methods.name: Cosa_BackgroundCommit
methods.description: Performs background commit or rollback for parameter changes.
